title: Beyond Western Medicine - Heather Boon, University of Toronto
author: Amref Health Africa
description: Complementary andComplementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM)Alternative Medicine (CAM) Heather Boon, BScPhm, PhDHeather Boon, BScPhm, PhD Professor andProfess...
cleaned_text: a Professor and the Associate Dean of Graduate Education at the Leslie Dan Faculty of Pharmacy, University of Toronto. Dr. Boon will discuss alternative medicine in Canada, including its growth and recent developments, and the relationship between Western medicine and herbal treatments.
